DESCRIPTION: 狂気状態の敵は、ランダムな敵を攻撃する。毎ターン狂気は #b1 減少する。
ダメージを与えるコスト1の #yアタック 。 #y保留 、 #y廃棄
#yブロック を得るコスト1の #yスキル 。 #y保留 、 #y廃棄
Vigorous creatures deal #b34% more attack damage.
Fortified creatures receive #b33% less attack damage.
#y保留 、 #y廃棄 不可。 NL このカードの場所に関わらず、 #y難題 は進行する。

A summon that you can issue an order to every turn. If the pet dies, its respective pet card is removed from the deck. The pet’s HP persists between combats and is fully restored when you rest at a campfire. You can only have one pet summoned at a time.
Removed from your master deck after being played the specified number of times.
Transforms into a special reward after being played the specified number of times.
When you have insufficient [E] to play this card, you may instead pay #b1 HP for every missing [E] .
